menu_options.new: Add a new entity to sync
menu_options.edit: Edit group addresses of an entity

new.title: Add new entity
new.description: Select the entity you want to add to sync.

remove.title: Remove an entity
remove.description: Select the entity you want to remove from sync.

edit.title: Edit group addresses
edit.description: Select the entity you want to group address aassignments for.

light.title: Edit light
light.description: Edit group addresses to sync this light with.

data_description.answer_reads: Whether to answer GroupValueRead requests to state addresses with the last sent state.
data_description.address: DPT-1 | Light will be switched on/off.
data_description.state_address: DPT-1 | Light will report its on/off state.
data_description.brightness_address: DPT-5 | Light will dim to requested percentage.
data_description.brightness_state_address: DPT-5 | Light will report its dim level.
data_description.zero_brightness_when_off: Light will also report 0% brightness when turned off.
data_description.color_address: DPT-232.600 | Light will set its color.
data_description.color_state_address: DPT-232.600 | Light will report its color.

climate.title: Edit climate
climate.description: Edit group addresses to sync this climate entity with.

data_description.answer_reads: Whether to answer GroupValueRead requests to state addresses with the last sent state.
data_description.temperature_address: DPT-9.001 | CLimate will report its current temperature.
data_description.target_temperature_address: DPT-9.001 | Climate will set setpoint temperature.
data_description.target_temperature_state_address: DPT-9.001 | Climate will report setpoint temperature.
data_description.operation_mode_address: DPT-20.102 | Climate will set its operation mode.
data_description.operation_mode_state_address: DPT-20.102 | Climate will report its operation mode.
data_description.controller_mode_address: DPT-20.105 | Climate will set its controller mode.
data_description.controller_mode_state_address: DPT-20.105 |Climate will report its controller mode.

binary_sensor.title: Edit binary sensor
binary_sensor.description: Edit group address to sync this binary sensor with. This is handled through KNX exposure so GroupValueReads are always answered.

data_description.state_address: DPT-1 | Binary sensor will report its on/off state.
